args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type _} [MetricSpace Y]

theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8 (f_n : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f : X â†’ Y) (x_n : â„• â†’ X) (x : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f_n n))
  (h_x : Tendsto x_n atTop (ð“ x))
  (h_uniform : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n, n â‰¥ N â†’ âˆ€ x', dist (f_n n x') (f x') < Îµ) :
  Tendsto (fun n => f_n n (x_n n)) atTop (ð“ (f x)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type _} [MetricSpace Y]

theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8 (f_n : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f : X â†’ Y) (x_n : â„• â†’ X) (x : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f_n n))
  (h_x : Filter.Tendsto (x_n : â„• â†’ X) Filter.atTop (ð“ x))
  (h_uniform : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n, n â‰¥ N â†’ âˆ€ x', dist (f_n n x') (f x') < Îµ) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun n => f_n n (x_n n)) Filter.atTop (ð“ (f x)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type _} [MetricSpace Y]

theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8 (f_n : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f : X â†’ Y) (x_n : â„• â†’ X) (x : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f_n n))
  (h_x : Filter.Tendsto x_n Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds x))
  (h_uniform : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n, n â‰¥ N â†’ âˆ€ x', dist (f_n n x') (f x') < Îµ) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun n => f_n n (x_n n)) Filter.atTop (Filter.nhds (f x)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type _} [MetricSpace Y]

theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8 (f_n : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f : X â†’ Y) (x_n : â„• â†’ X) (x : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f_n n))
  (h_x : Filter.Tendsto x_n Filter.atTop (ð“ x))
  (h_uniform : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, âˆ€ x' : X, dist (f_n n x') (f x') < Îµ) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun n => f_n n (x_n n)) Filter.atTop (ð“ (f x)) := by

import Mathlib

variable {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type _} [MetricSpace Y]

theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8 (f_n : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f : X â†’ Y) (x_n : â„• â†’ X) (x : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f_n n))
  (h_x : Filter.Tendsto x_n Filter.atTop (nhds x))
  (h_uniform : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, âˆ€ x' : X, dist (f_n n x') (f x') < Îµ) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun n => f_n n (x_n n)) Filter.atTop (nhds (f x)) := by
  sorry
